  • Aug 6, 2011

    218: We went to the zoo

    Day trips like this are exactly why I borrowed my Dad's telephoto lens. Sorry, Dad, I will give it back to you soon, I promise.

    Dudley Zoo is quite nice. You should go.

    The toilets.

    The old chairlift.

    If you think there are too many photos here, bear in mind I did take 500. This could have been so much worse.

  • Aug 1, 2011

    212: Leamington

    We visited Leamington to have a walk around, look in a few estate agency windows, etc. We're really looking forward to moving there. Lots of saving to do in the meantime, though. Just got to keep reminding ourselves that the longer we wait, the more affordable it gets.

  • Jul 26, 2011

    201: John

    I've been thinking about doing a 100 Strangers project for a little while, as a way to get me more confident in both taking pictures of people and also approaching them to ask if I can do it in the first place.

    John asking me for some spare change seemed like a good opportunity to start (he approached me after all), and in the end he was happy for me to take his picture.
